name: Turtle Team
description:
Use the Right Mouse button to move camera.
Use the Left Mouse button to select and move around the turtle team.

Mouse over arrows to pilot Turtle.

Collect food and make it to the Goal at the end, where the Turtle will be safe!

BUG: Sometimes when the pilot gets eaten, the ability to move around units gets broken and the game is effectively lost, as you cannot put another unit in the pilot seat to keep piloting the turtle. If you have a unit selected that gets eaten, it breaks the mouse control code with a null reference. Try to always deselect when you're done moving a unit.
